Subject: Self-editing for Fiction Writers
Description: Join us for a discussion of techniques and suggestions for authors interested in self-publishing, preparing a manuscript for submission, or before hiring an editor.  Speakers include:Mary Lynne Gibbs, Jean Davis, G.S. Scott - Track: Lit  - Duration: 1 hour

Subject: Getting Motivated to Write
Description: Learn some ways to get into the writing frame of mind, including challenges, groups, and staying motivated.  Speakers include:Fred Paffhausen, Jean Davis, BluRaven Houvener - Track: Lit  - Duration: 1 hour

Subject: Fiction Writing: Where to Begin
Description: Join us for a session of getting ideas and creating characters, worlds, and interesting plots for both long and short fiction.  Speakers include:Mary Lynne Gibbs, Jean Davis, G.S. Scott - Track: Lit  - Duration: 1 hour
